titleStmt.title: The schoole of good manners. Or, A new schoole of vertue. Teaching children & youth how they ought to behaue themselues in all companies, times, and places. / Translated out of French. By W.F..
ABC ou instruction pour les petis enfans. English. 1595
titleStmt.author: Phiston, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Danter, for William Ihones: and are to be sold at the signe of the Gun neare Holburne Conduit.,

notesStmt.note: Title within ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 86); headpieces, initials.
A translation of: L'ABC ou instruction pour les petis enfans. Anvers, C. Plantin, 1564.
Imperfect: tightly bound and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
